document_data.name: Gallery Majesta
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gallery Majesta''' was a museum and a temple to [[Deneir]] in the city of [[Calimport]],<ref name=Calimport-pp56-57 /> one of a number of such locations in [[Calimshan]].
document_data.Location: The temple was located in [[Calimport/Quill Ward#Jhaapir Sabban|Jemil Drudach of Jhaapir Sabban]] within [[Calimport/Quill Ward|Quill Ward]].<ref name=Calimport-pp56-57 />
document_data.Structure: The building was a three-story structure of excellent construction.<ref name=Calimport-pp56-57 />
document_data.Interior:
The first floor served as a temple. Visitors were not allowed to enter unless they also attended a prayer service or made a donation to the temple treasury.<ref name=Calimport-pp56-57 />

The second floor was the museum, where a good number of impressive exhibits displayed magical [[artifact]]s. In truth, while the items on display were indeed magical, they were only copies of the true artifacts, which were stored deep in the vaults beneath the temple. The magics on the display items were tracking enchantments. Anyone who tried stealing an artifact could thus be easily found and summarily beheaded.<ref name=Calimport-pp56-57 />

The entrance to the secret vault was hidden underneath the main altar on the first floor. The altar could be moved, providing access to a long series of winding stairs.<ref name=Calimport-pp56-57 />

Third floor housed the [[Deneir]]rath who served at the temple.<ref name=Calimport-pp56-57 />
